rajawali.renderer

Class AFrameTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajawali.renderer.AFrameTask
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Animation3D, AResourceManager, ATexture, ATransformable3D, EmptyTask, GroupTask, Material, ObjectColorPicker, Plugin, RajawaliScene

    public abstract class AFrameTask
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an abstract class to extend for things which need to have their addition/removal/modification in the scene properly regulated by the RajawaliRenderer and OpenGL thread.
    Author:
    Jared Woolston (jwoolston@tenkiv.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AFrameTask.TASK

      The type of object this task is acting on.
